attributes.additional_details:
Providing free inhalers ensures that individuals with asthma, a chronic and sometimes life-threatening condition, have equal access to essential medications, regardless of their financial status. This upholds the principle of healthcare as a fundamental right.

This medication is generally considered to be required for a lifespan in most, and is required to live a normal healthy life.
attributes.background: Review the cost of inhalers and to make free in line with other medications such as contraceptives and thyroid medication.
